thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Steven Ross

author: Steven Ross
title: Steven Ross
text: Email link for accepting booking is far too laborious. I had no wish to work through the creation of a profile and all the other questions associated with the link. All I wanted to do was pay my deposit since I had already provided the profile information. I rang the 1300 number and made my deposit payment with no hassle. The person I dealt with was very helpful and made sure I understood the terms and conditions before accepting my payment. I'm not sure why your email link can't be this simple.
